snippet: The attempted murder charge against 9-month-old Musa Khan prompted widespread scorn of the Pakistani legal system.
abstract: Police in Pakistan drop murder charges against 9-month-old Musa Khan, case that led to widespread ridicule of the Pakistani legal system.
lead_paragraph: The attempted murder charge against 9-month-old Musa Khan prompted widespread scorn of the Pakistani legal system.

headline.main: Police Drop Charges Against Baby in Pakistan
headline.print_headline: Police Drop Charges Against Baby in Pakistan
